articles.author: Sandip G
articles.title: India’s tour of South Africa: The door shuts on Cheteshwar Pujara & Ajinkya Rahane - The Indian Express
articles.description: Suddenly, India have struck a mouth-watering balance between the old and youth and the two veteran middle-order pillars  have to now move on.
articles.content: In search of a new beginning, Indias selectors have discarded the flailing old-guard of Cheteshwar Pujara and Ajinkya Rahane from the tour of South Africa. Both are 35, both have been enduring a dry … [+5143 chars]
